task.summary: Storage containers now send and receive operations between each other
Code restructuring to manipulate operations Cleanup
Changed params of operation to hashmap for more flexibility
Reformated storage controller, now having problem syncing view
Added getState method to solve problem getting state, updated test classes
Storage controllers now syncs from local database upon start up, and updates it
Cleaned up database creation to acknowledge changes in operation fields
Download server work Still getting netty errors
Moved everything related to operations into a new class OperationManager Updated tests in consequence
Google cloud working (can add new instances)
Added ability to run multiple grpc servers on one machine
added separate xml config file for google vms
Fixed tests for election of leader Separated storage controller into one base class for jchannel + one implementation class
Moved tests to where they should be
Started adding storage pool logic to controller
Can now add operations to storage pools
Solved database not reading all column names of entries
deleted useless function that made the storage pool download a file - the storage pool now starts a pool of downloaders that wait for inputs
accepts storagepool registration and propagates it to other storage controllers
updated local storage pool code to not store empty shards (storage pool identifications)
added exception handling, still can't connect to storage pools
Modified grpc code Cleaned up useless classes
